TITLE: Alexander, the Shield
ABILITY1: The maximum reinforcement for this character is increased to 5.
ABILITY2: Reassign up to 3 damage from a single allied character to this character.

TITLE: Amy, the Eye
ABILITY1: Choose one of your opponent's fatelines. That fateline is revealed as long as this character is unbroken. When you are the initiator, you may pay `X` crystal charge to activate that fateline as if it were your own at stack level `X-1`.

TITLE: Audrey, the Siren
ABILITY1: When you are not the initiator, you may pay 1 crystal charge to trigger a single fateline at the start of the Action phase.

TITLE: Caius, the Heart
ABILITY1: Assign 5 damage between targets of your choice.

TITLE: Cheryl, the Thief
ABILITY1: When you are able to respond during the action phase, you may use basic dice actions.
ABILITY2: Choose a target character. Assign 2 damage to that character; assign 1 damage to each of the characters adjacent to that character.

TITLE: Zeta, the Chaos
REALIZE: Gain max crystal charge with no channel time; unbreak this character.
ABILITY1: You cannot use basic actions. When you are the initiator, you must declare an ability usage with this character during the Action phase if able.

TITLE: Wilt, the Usurper
ABILITY1: When this character is broken, remove all reinforcement from a target character. Gain that many crystal charges.

TITLE: Sidney, the Merchant
ABILITY1: During the fate phase: - As the initiator, you may stack an additional fate during your stack. - As a non-initiator, you may stack a single fate during your seed.

TITLE: Samantha, the Virtuoso
ABILITY1: Assign `X` damage where `X` is the total reinforcement of allied characters.

TITLE: Ren, the Enigma
ABILITY1: When the opponent channels `X`, gain `X` crystal charge.

TITLE: Natalie, the Gambler
ABILITY1: After the Roll phase, you may reroll up to 2 dice.

TITLE: Lucille, the Light
ABILITY1: All of your characters' max reinforcement is increased to 5.

TITLE: Leslie, the Mark
ABILITY1: Choose one of an opponent's non-reinforced characters to mark.
ABILITY2: Remove all reinforcement from a character marked by Leslie.
ABILITY3: When a character marked by Leslie uses an ability, the mark is consumed and you gain 1 crystal charge.

TITLE: Jennifer, the Pulse
ABILITY1: Once per turn when an ability you activate deals damage, you may stack or seed a fate.
ABILITY2: Once per turn when you stack or seed a fate, gain 1 crystal charge.

TITLE: Genevieve, the Scholar
ABILITY1: When playing crystallized fates, you may use `X` additional crystal charges to increase the stack level by `X-1`.
ABILITY2: After the Roll phase, gain 1 crystal charge.

TITLE: Christina, the Prodigy
ABILITY1: Assign `X` damage, where `X` is the number of crystal charges in your possession.
ABILITY2: Reinforce `X`, where `X` is the number of fates in your fate area.
